title: WTB Ty Cobb green port or bat on
author: brewing

posts.post_title: WTB Ty Cobb green port or bat on
posts.post_content:
Looking for low grade examples. Prefer graded 1 to 1.5

Will pay 400-500 bat on and 900 - 1100 for green port. Depending on eye appeal. Don't want mutillated, there are a few mutilated ones on eBay already available. 

Send scan to classicml at yahoo

Pm sent regarding a Cobb bat on.

Matt
